content.question:
SECONDARY SCHOOL ENROLLMENT PERCENT, 2016(PERCENT OF ELIGIBLE AGE GROUP ENROLLED)

Source: World Bank

Which of the following spatial patterns accurately describes the data presented in the map?

choices.label: Most continents have countries with secondary school enrollments below 75 percent.
There are no countries in Africa with secondary school enrollments above 90 percent.
The majority of countries with less than 70 percent secondary school enrollment are in sub-Saharan Africa.
The secondary school enrollment is proportional to population density.
Landlocked countries have secondary school enrollments above 90 percent.

content.answer: The majority of countries with less than 70 percent secondary school enrollment are in sub-Saharan Africa.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
